info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Tappeiner, John

publications.text: Deal, R.L., and J.C. Tappeiner. 2002. The Effects of Partial Cutting on Stand Structure and Growth in Western Hemlock-Sitka Spruce Stands in Southeast Alaska. Forest Ecology and Management. 159: 173-186.
